column2: Hey! Out of all of us, who do you think is gonna get married next?'
Probably Monica and Chandler.'
(to Gunther) Hi. Could I have a pack of Newport Lights,\nplease?'
Oh umm, uh we don\xc2\x92t sell cigarettes, but they have them at the\nnewsstand across the street. (Points.)'
That\xc2\x92d be great, thanks. (Gunther goes and gets them.)'
(to the gang) Oh my God, Melissa Warburton. I don\xc2\x92t think I have\nthe energy for this.'
(Gasps when she notices Rachel) Oh my God! Ray-ray Green?! (Screams)'
(screaming) Melissa!'
You have been M.I.A for the past seven sorority newsletters,\nwhat\xc2\x92s up with you?!'
Wh\xc2\x97(Turns and looks at the gang who\xc2\x92s staring)\xc2\x97Why\ndon\xc2\x92t I tell you over here? (She walks Melissa away from the gang.)'
So last I heard you were gonna get married. (Grabs Rachel\xc2\x92s hand\nand notices that she doesn\xc2\x92t have a ring on it.) (Sadly) Oh poor Ray-ray.'
Oh no-no, no! It\xc2\x92s good! It\xc2\x92s all good! I-I actually work at Ralph\nLauren!'
Shut up!'
I will not! I\xc2\x92m the divisional head of men\xc2\x92s sportswear!'
Oh shut up more! Now, are you friends with Ralph?'
Oh please\xc2\x85'
(excitedly) Are you?!'
No.'
Listen, we-we have to have dinner. What-what are you doing tomorrow\nnight?'
Oh tomorrow, oh I don\xc2\x92t know. Um\xc2\x85'
You do now. You\xc2\x92re having dinner with me.'
Shut up.'

I-I\xc2\x92ve got to go. This has been so great Ray-ray! (Gunther returns\nwith her cigarettes.) Oh, there you are. (Takes them from Gunther.) (To Rachel) Umm, so\nlisten, just call me. Here\xc2\x92s my card. (Hands the card over.)'
Oh, wow thanks! (Reading the card) Oh you\xc2\x92re in real estate!'
Oh no, that\xc2\x92s-that\xc2\x92s an old card. Umm, I wanted to get out of\nthat and-and do something where I can really help people and-and make a difference.'
Wow! What do you do now?'
(quietly) I\xc2\x92m a party planner. I\xc2\x92ll see you tomorrow.\n(Exits.)'
Okay! (Joins the rest of the gang.)'
Hey guys! Look who\xc2\x92s back! It\xc2\x92s Ray-ray!'
Shut up that was my friend Melissa from college.'
She seems really, really fun!'
She\xc2\x92s actually very sweet and we used to be very close.'
Wait a minute, she isn\xc2\x92t\xc2\x85 She\xc2\x92s not the one who you\xc2\x85'
(excitedly) Who you what? Who you what?!'
(To Monica) Yes.'
Wow!'
(excitedly) Wow? Wow what?! Wow what?! Who you\xc2\x97what?!!'
It\xc2\x92s not a big deal!'
(To Joey) They were lovers.'
What?!'
What?!'
No we weren\xc2\x92t! It was nothing! It was one night, senior year we\nwent to a party, had a lot of sangria and y\xc2\x92know, ended up\xc2\x85kissing for a\nbit.'
So that\xc2\x92s two of my wives.'

(telling Chandler the seating arrangement) Okay so this is where the
band is. (Points.) And this is where the bar is. (Points) And all these pins have
people\xc2\x92s names on them. (She has pins to show the seating at each of the tables.) And
Rach, here you are. (Points to Rachel\xc2\x92s place.)'

Oh wow. Why don\xc2\x92t we just take me (Grabs her pin) and put me with a\nManhattan in my hand, talking to the cute bartender. (Puts her pin at the bar and laughs.\nMonica just glares at her.) These pins aren\xc2\x92t for playing are they?'
(To Chandler) Okay, the red ones are my guests and the blue ones are\nyours.'
This is so sad. I mean, I only have like ten pins.'
Chandler, relax it\xc2\x92s not a contest. (To Rachel) Certainly not a\nclose one.'
(entering) Hello!'
Hey!'
Hey Rach. (Stares at her.) '
Stop picturing it!!'
Okay, I think that\xc2\x92s it. The seating chart is done. This is our\nwedding. They all look like they\xc2\x92re having fun don\xc2\x92t they?'
Hey, so where are my parents gonna be?'
Oh! (Gets up) Let\xc2\x92s see, well\xc2\x85if this is the wedding hall then\numm (Walks away) you\xc2\x92re parents will be at home in Queens.'
What they\xc2\x92re not invited?! Oh no, that\xc2\x92s terrible! They\xc2\x92re\ngonna be crushed!'
Why would they think they\xc2\x92re invited?'
(looking around) You got me. I don\xc2\x92t\xc2\x85'
Joey!'
Well, I\xc2\x92m sorry. I thought parents were coming! Y\xc2\x92know? Your\nparents are comin\xc2\x92! Chandler\xc2\x92s parents are comin\xc2\x92! Ross\xc2\x92s parents are\ncomin\xc2\x92!'
Ross\xc2\x92s parents are my parents!'
Well-well\xc2\x97see? Parents are comin\xc2\x92!'
Y\xc2\x92know I think we should invite them.'
Oh please, you just want more blue pins.'
Well this is just sad!'
All right, all right. Maybe I can fit them in if I just do some\nrearranging. But uh, Rachel may actually have to sit at the bar!'
That is not a problem.'
(leaning down to her) Maybe you\xc2\x92ll order a little sangria?'
Oh, get out of here! (Jumps back and walks away.)'

(motioning to a rack) So now, these are all the tuxedos that we make and\nif there\xc2\x92s anything that you like, we can make you a deal. Anything at all. (Grabs a\nfew) But these are the three that Monica pre-approved.'
Well, thanks a lot for hookin\xc2\x92 me up Rach. I want you to know\nthat I want you to attend our wedding as my guest.'
I\xc2\x92m Monica\xc2\x92s maid of honor. Okay? Don\xc2\x92t try to blue pin\nme!'
(sees another rack) Well, what\xc2\x92s the deal with these? These-these\nlook nice.'
Oh they are nice. We-we custom-make tuxedos for celebrities and then\nwhen they\xc2\x92re done with them they just send \xc2\x91em back.'
You mean like for award shows?'
Some of them.'
You mean these tuxes have been down the red carpet with people\nyelling, "You are you wearing?! You look fabulous!"'
Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little\nless E!?'
Okay, who wore those? (Points to the tuxedos.)'
Umm, well let\xc2\x92s see uh, this one is Tom Brokaw.'
Not bad.'
(reading a tag) This one is uh Paul O\xc2\x92Neil.'
Who\xc2\x92s that?'
He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN! Just once and a while,\nhave it on in the background. (Chandler nods and Rachel grabs another tux) Ooh, this one\nwas Pierce Brosnan!'
Pierce Brosnan?'
Uh-huh.'
Are you serious?'
Yeah.'
007?! This is James Bond\xc2\x92s tux?!'
Yeah.'
Oh, I have to get married in James Bond\xc2\x92s tux!'
It\xc2\x92s a pretty cool tux.'

Oh, it\xc2\x92s not just that, I would be England\xc2\x92s most powerful\nweapon. Jet setting heartbreaker on her majesty\xc2\x92s secret service. A man who fears no\none; with a license to kill. (Worried.) Would Monica let me wear this?'
We should really learn how to play the real way. (Moves another piece.)'
I like our way. Oh! (Grabs a piece and jumps a bunch of Joey\xc2\x92s like\nin Checkers.) Chess!'
Nice move.'
Yeah.'
(entering) Hey!'
Hey!'
Hey!'
So Joey I just hooked Ross and Chandler up with some tuxedos for the\nwedding, do you need one?'
No, I\xc2\x92m performing the ceremony. I\xc2\x92m not wearing a tux.'
Well, what are you going to wear?'
Multi-colored robes! Ooh, and maybe a hat.'
Huh. Does Monica know about this?'
I don\xc2\x92t think so.'
Can I please be there when you tell her? (Joey nods yes.)'
Hey oh, Rach wait! Do you want to go to a movie tonight?'
Oh, y\xc2\x92know what? I can\xc2\x92t. I have to have dinner with that\nMelissa girl.'
(excitedly) Can I come?! I won\xc2\x92t even talk! You\xc2\x92ll just hear the\nnoise from my video camera.'
What is this? What\xc2\x92s going on?'
Oh good! Can I tell her?! Can I tell her?!'
Well, do you want to hear what actually happened or Joey\xc2\x92s lewd\nversion?'
Joey\xc2\x92s!'
Okay\xc2\x85'
Hey, come on! I had this friend from college and I made the stupid\nmistake of telling Joey that one time\xc2\x85she and I y\xc2\x92know\xc2\x85kissed a little bit.'
(laughs) Yeah, I\xc2\x92m sure that happened.'
It-it did!'
Sure!'
Hey. (Laughs then seriously) It happened!'
Yeah, it was senior year in college. It was after the Sigma Chi luau and\nMelissa and I got very drunk! And we ended up kissing! For several minutes! '
(To Joey) Which means she had a couple spritzers and a quick peck on the\ncheek.'
Why are you taking this away from me?'
Yeah, why is it so hard for you to believe?!'
Okay! I just\xc2\x97I didn\xc2\x92t know that you are a lesbian. (Joey\nsmiles and nods lewdly.)'
I\xc2\x92m not saying that I\xc2\x92m a lesbian! I\xc2\x92m just saying that\nthis happened!'
Okay, it just seems pretty wild and you\xc2\x92re so\xc2\x97y\xc2\x92know\nso\xc2\x85vanilla.'
(shocked) Vanilla?!'
Yeah.'
I\xc2\x92m not vanilla! I\xc2\x92ve done lots of crazy things! I mean I\ngot-I got drunk and married in Vegas!'
To Ross.'
All right, y\xc2\x92know what? If you don\xc2\x92t want to believe me about\nthis, why don\xc2\x92t you just come with me to dinner tonight and she will tell you.'
Okay! All right! Yeah! \xc2\x91Cause I just can\xc2\x92t picture it.'
Oh-ho, you should get inside my head.'
Hey! Guess what I got for your wedding! (Holding up his garment bag.)'
A freakish thin date with a hanger for her head?'
No. Rachel hooked me up with a tux! But not just any tux, Batman\xc2\x92s\ntux!'
What?'
That\xc2\x92s right! Made expressly for Val Kilmer and worn by him in the\nhit film\xc2\x85that Batman film he was in.'
You can\xc2\x92t wear that! I\xc2\x92m wearing the famous tux! James\nBond\xc2\x92s tux!'
So?'
So\xc2\x97If you wear that you\xc2\x92ll make mine less special.'
Well, you need something to make this day special? Hello! You-you-you have\nthe most special thing of all! You are marrying the woman you love.'
Please, don\xc2\x92t take away my cool thing. Please?! Pretty please?!'
Pretty please? Not very uh, 007.'
Look, it\xc2\x92s my wedding day okay? If you were getting married I\nwould never do anything to upset you.'
When I got married you slept with my sister.'
That was pretty 007.'
Hey.'

Hey. Oh good-good you\xc2\x92re here! All right, I figured it out.
I\xc2\x92m gonna take two tables of eight, I\xc2\x92m gonna add your parents, and I\xc2\x92m
gonna turn them into three tables of six. Okay? And I called the caterer; I added two
extra meals, we are good to go!'
Yeah, they\xc2\x92re not coming.'
(looking at him) What?!'
Somehow they got the idea that you only invited them because of me.\nThey\xc2\x85feel a little unwanted.'
Oh that\xc2\x92s too bad. It\xc2\x92s true, but too bad.'
Look Mon, if you could just call my mom\xc2\x85'
Oh Joey!'
Come on! Look just-just tell\xc2\x97let her know that you really want them\nto be there. Let\xc2\x92s not forget, this is a woman that has sent you many lasagnas over\nthe years.'
No she hasn\xc2\x92t.'
Is it her fault that some of them didn\xc2\x92t make it to you?'
Well, what am I going to say?'

I don\xc2\x92t know. Just uh, just tell \xc2\x91em it was a mix-up with the
invitations, or\xc2\x97No-no-no! Blame it on the post office. They hate the post
office. And the Irish! But I don\xc2\x92t think you can blame it on them so\xc2\x85 (He dials
the phone and hands it to Monica.)'

(on phone) Hello? (Listens) Yeah, hi! Mrs. Tribbiani? (Listens) Hi, this
is Monica Geller. (Listens) Yeah I\xc2\x92m just calling to say that Chandler and I uh,
really hope you can make it to the wedding. Yeah, apparently a bunch of invitations that
we sent weren\xc2\x92t delivered. Umm, I guess there was some screw up at the damn post
office! (Joey nods his approval.) (Listens) T-Tell me about it! (Listens) Yeah, yeah, the
US Post Office? No, more like US lost office! (Listens) What are they Irish?! (Joey gives
her a thumbs up.)'

\xc2\x85anyway, his name is Allan and we\xc2\x92ve been going out for three
years. He was my first client when I became a party planner. He was planning a party for
his girlfriend at the time. Oh well. (Rachel and Phoebe politely laugh) And he was Theta
Beta Pi at Syracuse.'
Oh. Oh, that\xc2\x92s great!'
Hmm Phoebe, were you ever in a sorority?'
Of course! Yeah, I was uh, umm Thigh Mega Tampon.'
What one?'
Yeah! Y\xc2\x92know, we were really huge too, but then they had to shut us\ndown when Regina Philange died of alcohol poisoning.'
Oh, isn\xc2\x92t a shame when one girl ruins it for the whole bunch?\n(Phoebe agrees by grunting.)'
(changing the subject) Anyway, speaking of drinking too much. I was uh,\ntellin\xc2\x92 Phoebe about that one crazy night after the Sigma Chi luau where you and I\nuh, we made out.'
(shocked) What?'
Remember?! We\xc2\x97come on both had the sarongs on, and we had the-the\ncoconut bikini tops\xc2\x85'
Yeah?'
\xc2\x85we went back the house and we got really silly and we\xc2\x85we made\nout.'
Oh wow, Ray-ray I have no idea what you\xc2\x92re talking about.'
Really?!'
Ross is Batman!'
Well, he did manage to keep his identity secret for a long time.'
Rachel got Ross the tuxedo that Val Kilmer wore in Batman. Okay Batman\nis so much cooler than James Bond!'
What are you talking about?! 007 has all those gadgets!'
Batman has a utility belt!'
007 has a fancy car!'
Batman has the Batmobile!'
007 gets all the ladies.'
Batman has Robin! (Pause) We get ESPN right?'
How about you go put on your 007 tuxedo and I\xc2\x92ll make you a nice\nmartini.'
Actually, I don\xc2\x92t like martinis.'
How about a Youhoo with a funny straw?'
Ooh, yum! (Runs into the bedroom.)'
(entering) Hey.'
Hey.'
Listen, I know the invitation says 6
The show?!'
Right. Right. The wedding, gotcha. But I mean, it\xc2\x92s gonna start a\nlittle late right? I mean, weddings start late. Right?'
Have you ever been to one of my weddings?'

Ah. Yeah. Well look, the thing is it\xc2\x92s the same day as my
niece\xc2\x92s christening and I really want my parents to be there in time to see me.
\xc2\x91Cause my part\xc2\x92s just in the beginning I\xc2\x92m not even in the rest of the
show\xc2\x97Wedding!'
The wedding starts at six.'
Okay. Okay, I totally hear ya. Oo how about this? I vamp a little\n\xc2\x91til they get there?'
You\xc2\x92ll vamp?!'

Yeah! Yeah y\xc2\x92know, like warm up the crowd. Ask \xc2\x91em where
they\xc2\x92re from. \xc2\x91Cause in Joey Tribbiani you get a minister and you get an
entertainer. I\xc2\x92m a minis-tainer! (Rapping) There is no one better! There is no one
greater!'
How can you not remember us kissing?!'
I don\xc2\x92t know. I don\xc2\x92t remember a lot of things that never\nhappened.'
Wh\xc2\x85 Come on! Remember? We were on the sleeping porch! We\ncouldn\xc2\x92t stop giggling? And our coconuts kept knockin\xc2\x92 together?'
Oh, somewhere Joey\xc2\x92s head is exploding.'
Yeah\xc2\x97but come on\xc2\x97Listen, I\xc2\x92m sorry I don\xc2\x92t want to\nmake you uncomfortable, but I told Phoebe that it happened and she doesn\xc2\x92t believe\nme.'
I\xc2\x92m sorry Ray-ray. I mean if I thought it happened I would say it.\nMaybe I passed out and you did stuff to me while I was sleeping.'
No!!'
Rachel, it\xc2\x92s okay. You don\xc2\x92t have to do this. I believe you.\nAll right? Okay, if-if you say that you kissed Melissa, then you kissed Melissa.'
Thank you Phoebe.'
She didn\xc2\x92t.'
I know.'
Hey!'
You just carry that around?'
Yes. I find it to be something of a conversation piece. '
Between you and\xc2\x85'
Gunther. (To Chandler) Hey-hey! Why don\xc2\x92t we put them on? Y\xc2\x92know\nget a picture of Batman and James Bond together.'
I would but mine doesn\xc2\x92t fit. The pants are a little tight.'
A little tight? I could see double-oh and seven in those pants.'
Well that stinks. I was looking forward to us wearing our celebrity tuxes\ntogether.'
Well, does that mean that you\xc2\x92re not going to wearing yours?'
What are you kidding? It\xc2\x92s Batman\xc2\x92s tux!!'
(standing up) Let me try it on!'
Okay, but just the jacket. Double-oh and seven are not gettin\xc2\x92 in\nthere.'
(trying on the jacket) Okay. Holy double-vented comfort Batman! (Finds\nsomething in the pocket) What\xc2\x92s this?'
What?'
An invitation for the At First Sight premiere? Oh my God! Val\nKilmer didn\xc2\x92t wear this in Batman! He wore it to the premiere of some tooty-fruity\nlove story where he played a blind guy!'
Let me see that! (Grabs the invitation and reads it.) Oh man!'
The only superpower you have is a slightly heightened sense of smell.\n(Hands him the jacket and walks away.)'
(entering) Hey! Uh, Monica? Chandler? Can I talk to you guys for a second?'

All right that\xc2\x92s it, I give up! Whatever you want you can have it!\nYou wanna sing a song? You wanna do a dance? You want your mom stand at the Alter and\nscream racial slurs? I don\xc2\x92t care!'
No! No, I-I just wanna thank you guys for what you did for my parents,\nthat was really sweet. They\xc2\x92re so happy they get to be a part of your special day.'
(defeated) Oh.'
Well, you\xc2\x92re welcome. And tell them we\xc2\x92re really glad\nthey\xc2\x92re coming.'

Okay. I will. Ohh! Check out what they got me to wear for the ceremony!
(Runs to his apartment and returns wearing a rather silly hat.) Huh? I wear it like this
when I marry you guys, and then this (He tilts it to the side of his head) is for party
time.'
It happened! I am telling you it happened!'

Okay. (To Phoebe) Well, it was great meeting you. And uh Rachel, I-I\ndon\xc2\x92t think I\xc2\x92ll be calling you (hails a cab) because umm, y\xc2\x92know\nyou\xc2\x92ve gotten weird. (The cab pulls up.) Take care you guys.'

What?! Wait a minute! No wait a minute! (She does so.) Okay? Look, that
night was the one wild thing I have ever done in my entire life, and I\xc2\x92m not
gonna let you take that away from me! Okay, so if you don\xc2\x92t remember that, maybe
you will remember this! (She grabs Melissa and kisses her on the lips.)'
My God! You love me!'
(shocked) What?'

Of course I remember our kiss. I think about it all the time. I can
still hear the coconuts knockin\xc2\x92 together I\xc2\x85 (Phoebe is shocked.) I just
didn\xc2\x92t want to tell you \xc2\x91cause I didn\xc2\x92t think that you\xc2\x92d return my
love, and now that you have\xc2\x85 (Leans in to kiss Rachel.)'
(moving away) Whoa! Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! Whoa! Whoa!'
Aww, look who\xc2\x92s being suddenly shy. You can\xc2\x92t tell me you\ndon\xc2\x92t feel what I feel. Nobody can kiss that good and not mean it. (Goes in again.)'
(moves away again) I-I-I-I\xc2\x92m just\xc2\x85I\xc2\x92m just a good kisser!'
(suddenly frightened) Shut up!'
I\xc2\x92m sorry!'

(laughs) Oh you don\xc2\x92t have to be (Laughs again) sorry.
I\xc2\x92m\xc2\x85I\xc2\x92m obviously kidding. I\xc2\x92m not in love with you. (To Phoebe)
I\xc2\x92m not in love with her. I don\xc2\x92t hear coconuts banging together. Yeah, I
don\xc2\x92t\xc2\x85picture your face when I make love to my boyfriend. Anyway, I gotta go.
Eh\xc2\x85kiss good-bye? (Rachel stares at her stunned.) No? Okay. (Hurries into the cab and
drives off.)'
Wow! I mean I had no idea that that was gonna\xc2\x85'
What the hell was that?!'
I just wanted to see what all the fuss was about.'
And?'
I\xc2\x92ve had better.'
(yelling from the changing room) All right! I found one that fits!'
Well y\xc2\x92know what they say, the 23rd time\xc2\x92s the\ncharm. (Chandler enters.) Aww, look at you all handsome!'
Whose is it?'
Oh does it matter?! All that matters is that you look so handsome.'
Whose is it?'
I don\xc2\x92t want to say.'
Oh, come on! I don\xc2\x92t care! Come on! Whose is it?'
Diane Keeton.'
